articles.description: Victoria sets aside $540m in 2020/21 state budget to develop renewable energy hubs across the state in “unprecedented” public spend on greening the grid.
articles.content: Victorias Labor state government has set aside $540 million to develop six dedicated renewable energy hubs across the state, as it works to unlock and accommodate gigawatts-worth of new large-scale s… [+4589 chars]
